House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01910
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO ADDRESSING THE ISSUE OF LABOR CONTRACTUALIZATION BY PROVIDING STANDARDS FOR TERM OR FIXED-PERIOD EMPLOYMENT, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 442, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS ꞌTHE LABOR CODE OF THE PHILIPPINESꞌ
ABSTRACT : Seeks to amend the present Labor Code so as to substantially implement it by providing standards specific to term or fixed-period employment, including but not limited to: a clear definition of term or fixed-period employment; requisites for validity of term or fixed-period employment; and condition for regularization of term or fixed-period employment.
